PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2018-10452018-08-01PS,  IRCC,  ,  ,  , 
ActImmigration and Refugee Protection Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Immigration and Refugee Protection Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the IMMIGRATION AND REFUGEE PROTECTION REGULATIONS in order to (1) ensure that the existing immigration enforcement framework is maintained by updating sections 19 and 246 of the IRPR so that they reference the Cannabis Act; and, (2) support the implementation of cannabis legalization.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2018-0170 Publication Date: 2018-08-22
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Regulations Amending the Immigration and Refugee Protection Regulations
precis: Regulations Amending the IMMIGRATION AND REFUGEE PROTECTION REGULATIONS in order to (1) ensure that the existing immigration enforcement framework is maintained by updating sections 19 and 246 of the IRPR so that they reference the Cannabis Act; and, (2) support the implementation of cannabis legalization.
